entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to by George as 'young, carefree, and innocent'.

entities.name: george
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is patting a parchment fondly.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Harry's other friend, who is closing his eyes with a grimace in response to Harry's question.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: The caretaker of Hogwarts, who is mentioned as having hauled Fred and George off to his office.

relationships.description: George is giving the parchment to Harry.
Fred is also giving the parchment to Harry.
George has possession of the parchment before giving it to Harry.
Fred also had possession of the parchment before giving it to Harry.
